Articles.Content:
Among other problems I've recently experienced (posted in the Modded Support section)... I've run across this:

![7JFAEur.png](http://i.imgur.com/7JFAEur.png)

...and I'm finding there's no way to fix it. *ARRRGH!* ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

> 
> Somewhere in your save file, this must exist... Having a quick look in mine, I'd be very suspicious of:
> 
> 
> SpaceCenter/Runway/Facility/End09
> 
> {
> 
>  intact = True
> 
> }
> 
> SpaceCenter/Runway/Facility/End27
> 
> {
> 
>  intact = True
> 
> }
> 
> SpaceCenter/Runway/Facility/Section1
> 
> {
> 
>  intact = True
> 
> }
> 
> SpaceCenter/Runway/Facility/Section2
> 
> {
> 
>  intact = True
> 
> }
> 
> SpaceCenter/Runway/Facility/Section3
> 
> {
> 
>  intact = True
> 
> }
> 
> SpaceCenter/Runway/Facility/Section4
> 
> {
> 
>  intact = True
> 
> }
> 
> SpaceCenter/Runway/Facility/Section5
> 
> {
> 
>  intact = True
> 
> }

*Thanks!* ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I will take a look. Playing a Science game, I should just be able to click on the runway and have a window pop up for repair - like the launchpad ... but for some reason, it's not doing that.

Solved the problem!

Thanks to the mod who moved the thread here for me... I should have known better to put it here in the first place. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
Sometimes the window may be at the top left corner regardless of your current cursor position.
